channel.title: Shake It On The Dancefloor !! Nu-Disco Electro
channel.description: An Hour Dancing Electro! Nu Disco Electro House Mini Tech Bass Dirty
channel.itunes:subtitle: Nu Disco, Indie Dance, Fidget, Filthy, Electro, Dirty, Electroclash, Techno n' More in a Mix!
channel.itunes:author: 2nD. BeaT!
channel.itunes:summary: An Hour Dancing Electro! Nu Disco Electro House Mini Tech Bass Dirty

item.title: A Mix For ... #1 lovedisco.fm
item.description: This is the first edition of mixes dedicated to the people who supported this podcast, this time takes the turn an internet radio station that have played all my episodes on saturday nights, Lovedisco.fm, Go check www.lovedisco.fm and listen to all those funky gold 70's - 80's tracks. Check out "From Disco To Disco" and "A Mix For ..." tracklists in a few days. Thanks for the support. 2nD. BeaT!
item.dc:creator: 2nD. BeaT!
item.itunes:summary:

Check out "From Disco To Disco" and "A Mix For ..." tracklists in a few days.
Thanks for the support.

item.title: From Disco To Disco
item.description: Hey hey, it's been a while since my last episode, but here it is! Disco Lovers sit down and listen. Tracklist will be posted soon. I'll try to publish the next episode before this year end so ... Merry Christmas and keep in touch! 2nD. BeaT!
item.dc:creator: 2nD. BeaT!
item.itunes:summary:

Tracklist will be posted soon.

item.title: You've Got The Rhythm
item.description: Episode 16 You've Got The Rhythm Shake It On The Dancefloor!! by 2nD. BeaT! It's been a while since I posted the last mix, problems at school got my time, but we're back!. It's a mix with some fresh and some old melodic tracks with that touch that makes you move your head, this time including Fred Falke, Daft Punk, Metronomy, Bag Raiders, Miami Horror, Cassian, Fufurecop!, DCUP, Go Go Bizkitt!, Lifelike and some more! Oh! and special thanks to Hannah Potts. Tracklist: 01- Dreams - Futurecop! ft. Keenhouse 02- I Like What You're Doing (Nightriders Remix) - Cassian 03- In It Together (Cassian Remix) - Human Life 04- Ghost (Hey Champ Remix) - Gemini Club 05- All I'm Dreaming Of (DCUP Remix) - Jen Bloom 06- Walking On A Dream (Go Go Bizkitt's Summer Falcon Jam!) - Empire Of The Sun 07- Holidays (Miami Horror & Cassian Remix) - Miami Horror 08- Embrace (Miami Horror & Fred Falke Remix) - PNAU ft. Ladyhawke 09- Too Long (French Government Be Awesome Edit) - Daft Punk 10- Sunlight (Armand Van Helden Remix) - Bag Raiders 11- The Look (Fred Falke Remix) - Metronomy 12- Keep Up With You (Likelike Remix) - Teenage Bad Girl Enjoy!.
item.dc:creator: 2nD. BeaT!

It's been a while since I posted the last mix, problems at school got my time, but we're back!. item.title: Very Very Disco
item.description: Episode 15 Very Very Disco Shake It On The Dancefloor!! by 2nD. BeaT! Wuuuuuuooooop !! hello everyone, as I said ... Year has not ended and here's the last mix of 2010, different music we've heard along the year but let's finish this with an amazing bouncy funky retro disco set that is mainly featured by The Phantom's Revenge and its new EP, some of La Zebra, Foamo, Miami Horror, Treasure Fingers, Burns & Fred Falke and Moulinex. For those Nu-Disco lovers I'll post more stuff like this next year, and as always, i hope you like it, thank you very much for follow me all this time and have a merry christmas and a fucking awesome 2011!. See you next year to keep moving our feet and of course shaking it on the dancefloor!! Tracklist: 01- Instant Replay (The Phantom's Revenge Remix) - Dan Hartman 02- Pump Up The Volume (Original Mix) - Audio Jacker 03- I Heard You Were Dead (Original Mix) - The Phantom's Revenge 04- Y.S.L.M. (You Stopped Loving Me)(Treasure Fingers Remix) - Burns & Fred Falke 05- Feel The Music (Original Mix) - La ZEBRA 06- Stand Up (Original Mix) - Discotron 07- Mighty - Lars Vegas 08- Generate Some Heat (Original Mix) - Foamo 09- Charlie (Original Mix) - The Phantom's Revenge 10- Saturated Phat Impact (Treasure Fingers Remix) - The Phantom's Revenge 11- French Cheese Funk (Original Mix) - The Phantom's Revenge 12- Last Man Standing (Original Mix) - The Phantom's Revenge 13- Machine Gun Girl (Original Mix) - The Phantom's Revenge 14- I Look To You (Go Go Bizkitt! Remix) - Miami Horror 15- Leisure Suite (Original Mix) - Moulinex Peace :)

item.title: I Feel GOOD!
item.description: Episode 14 I Feel GOOD! Shake It On The Dancefloor!! by 2nD. BeaT! Well well celebrating my birthday here's a new set called I Feel GOOD ... hmm... it's obviously I think :D... and it's sick! many many unstopping beats from fidget to electro crossing nu-disco and bangin, You'll like it :D. Im preparing my next episodes so keep an eye on iTunes or wherever you're getting this podcast, because this year is not over yet!. Enjoy :D Tracklist: 01- If We Try (The Love Anthem)- Reset! 02- Superman (Original Mix) - Lee Mortimer & Foamo 03- Super Disco Breakin (Project Cyborg Remix) - Beastie Boys 04- Play With It (Gigi Barocco Remix) - Breakdown 05- Movin It Over Here (Original Mix) - Foamo 06- Dare - Rico Tubbs 07- My Head (Para One Remix) - Boys Noize 08- My Babe Left Me (Gigi Barocco Remix) - Ninfa 09- Like To Freak (DJ Bam Bam Remix) - Kelevra 10- Get Crazy (Will Bailey Remix) - Costello 11- Girls Dem Go (Original Mix) - Detboi & Foamo 12- DNA (Audiostalkers Remix) - Baymont Bros Ft. MC Gi 13- Fan Out (Light Year Remix) - Surkin 14- Super Summer (Sharam Jey Remix) - Mightyfools 15- Together (Original Mix) - Herve 16- Rockerman (Lee Mortimer Remix) - Foamo 17- Barbra Streisand (Fare Soldi Remix) - Duck Sauce Aw!

item.title: Can't Shake This Feeling
item.description: Episode 13 I Can't Shake This Feeling Shake It On The Dancefloor!! by 2nD. BeaT! Hey hey, back with a melodic one, a pretty one, the noise is for later, sit back and listen to this in a rainy day or at night before going bed. See you then. Tracklist: 01- If I Ever Feel Better - Phoenix 02- Baby I'm Yours ft. IRFANE - Breakbot 03- Mama Used To Say - Jupiter 04- Drop The Tough (The Twelves Remix) - Groove Armada 05- Coma Cat - Tensnake 06- Crave You (Cassian Remix) - Flight Facilities ft. Giselle 07- I'll Get You ft. Jeppe - Clasixx 08- Can't Shake This Feeling (Dcup Remix) - Grum 09- Missing You ft. Ad-Apt - Louis La Roche 10- When We Were Young (Breakbot Remix) - Sneaky Sound System 11- Hold Me (Breakbot Remix) - Pacific! 12- Sometimes - Les Rythmes Digitales 13- Baby (Breakbot Remix) - Pnau Enjoy!

item.title: Nu Disco Fever
item.description:
Episode 12

Nu Disco Fever

Shake It On The Dancefloor!!

by 2nD. BeaT!

 

Hey hey, back with a retro, funky disco tunes that will make move your feet!, its a nu disco mix with many new tracks featuring duck sauce, treasure fingers, xinobi, moullinex and more!, chek it out and shake it on the dancefloor!!

Stay tunned for the next episode that i bet you'll really like.

Thanks to PaNdAzTk! and Hector for the cover.

 

Tracklist:

01. Valsa In NJ - Xinobi

02. Don't Stop (DMNDAYS Re-Edit) - Michael Jackson

03. 5 Motor Booty - Light Year

04. I Can't Loose - The Phantom's Revenge

05. Children (Original Mix) - Strip Steve

06. You're Nasty - Duck Sauce

07. Disco Texas Theme (Digitalfoxglove Remix) - Moulinex & Xinobi

08. Plus Size Model (Treasure Fingers Remix) - OH SNAP!!

09. Long Distance Call (Moonchild's '25 Hours A Day' Edit) - Phoenix

10. What Am I Supposed To Do - Treasure Fingers

11. Anyway - Duck Sauce

12. I Think I Like It (Tommie Sunshine & Figure Present EC$TASY Edit) - Fake Blood

13. Lover In Me - Moullinex

14. Satisfaction Guarenteed - La ZEBRA

15. 1999 (Reset! Remix) - Cassius

 

Enjoy!

item.title: Feel The Bass
item.description: Episode 11 Feel The Bass Shake It On The Dancefloor!! by 2nD. BeaT! hey hey, noise is back! lets hear a dirty mix with some news and some oldies tracks with a really really great bass! Wait for the next episode, and we will wanna dance! keep listening :D Thanks to PaNdAzTk for the cover ! Tracklist: 01. Robot Rock (Soulwax Remix) - Daft Punk 02. Night By Night (Siriusmo Remix - Boys Noize Edit) - Chromeo 03. Get A Grip (VIP Remix) - Dirty Super Car 04. OMG (Belzebass Remix) - Cyberpunkers 05. New Era (Kill The Noise Remix) - Retro Kidz 06. Jova (Original Mix) - The Sneekers 07. Brazen Boogie (Original Mix) - Dilemn 08. Wake Up - Les Petits Pilous 09. Catch The Looks (Dilemn Remix) - Dyebox 10. Gbay (Original Mix) - Huoratron 11. WARP 1.9 - The Bloody Beetroots 12. Set Me Free (Original Mix) - Drop The Lime 13. Vestige (Designer Drugs Remix) - Femme Enjoy!
